title: The Art of War
description: An ancient Chinese military treatise by Sun Tzu, focusing on strategies and tactics in warfare.

title: Atomic Habits
description: A guide by James Clear on building good habits, breaking bad ones, and mastering small, incremental improvements.

title: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical story by Paulo Coelho about a shepherd's journey to find his personal legend.
A dystopian novel by George Orwell, depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee's classic novel exploring themes of racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: Robert Kiyosaki's book on personal finance, comparing two fathers' approaches to wealth-building.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: Yuval Noah Harari's exploration of the history and impact of Homo sapiens on the world.

title: Think and Grow Rich
description: Napoleon Hill's classic self-help book on achieving success through visualization and belief.

title: The Power of Now
description: Eckhart Tolle's spiritual guide to mindfulness and living in the present moment.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
description: Mark Manson's unconventional advice on living a good life by focusing on what truly matters.
